entry.title: Saturday: Clearing. High plus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing late this morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 3 this evening and minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 07 January 2023
